# stories-buttons



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `collapse` | `collapse` | If true, buttons will disappear when its parent toolbar has fully collapsed if the toolbar is not the first toolbar. If the toolbar is the first toolbar, the buttons will be hidden and will only be shown once all toolbars have fully collapsed. | `boolean` | `false` |
